metadata.title: CVE-2024-53180 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ALSA: pcm: Add sanity NULL check for the default mmap fault handlerA driver might allow the mmap access before initializing itsruntime->dma_area properly.  Add a proper NULL check before passing tovirt_to_page() for avoiding a panic.
